subject: Upgrade Kit Instructions
description_text:
Hello,

Recently, I purchased the 3 pedal upgrade kit for the Simsonn Pro Plus
pedals to upgrade them to the Plus X. Is there any instructions for how to
install all the parts? Theres a lot of bearings, caps, and rods that im not
sure where they go

All the best,
Matt

conversations.body_text: Hi Matt Hazelgrove,  Please take a photo of the item. Tomorrow, I will ask my colleague to assemble a part and send you a photo for your reference.Â
